Question: In the movie 'Yuvvraaj' (2008), which of the following statements are true regarding the relationship between Deven Yuvvraaj Singh and Dr. P. K. Banton?
Options:
A. Deven Yuvvraaj Singh dislikes Dr. P. K. Banton due to his wealth.
B. Deven Yuvvraaj Singh finds Dr. P. K. Banton careless at times.
C. Dr. P. K. Banton is a wealthy individual.
D. Deven Yuvvraaj Singh has a fondness for Dr. P. K. Banton.
Answer: Deven Yuvvraaj Singh dislikes Dr. P. K. Banton due to his wealth., Deven Yuvvraaj Singh finds Dr. P. K. Banton careless at times.
